metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
40:15 – Autumn cicadas, casual clothing, annual leave, urge to go back to Ubud, hometowns, Paul Simon’s One Trick Pony album (1980), figuring out how not to sweat the big stuff, 2016 hipster terms (thesis, nuance), horrifying long haul flights, IKEA makes awesome cereal now, listener feedback (Jimbo, Shambles), and the world’s worst apartment lift design!

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released March 2016 on Rubénerd and The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.

Special thanks to the Internet Archive; their generous hosting makes this show possible.

metadata.title: Rubénerd Show 330: The Oh Marion episode
